body:
You may want to hide all of this inside an `#ifdef __ANDROID__` similar to https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/1737b809b7a7b258c81a77dd4e4670315c70b53d/tensorflow/c/c_api.cc#L2249 , since we don't include the required dependencies when building for Android (as per the BUILD file changes), which is probably a good thing since there doesn't seem to be a need for this in Android builds yet.

(So, these functions should fail if invoked in Android)

body_text:
You may want to hide all of this inside an #ifdef __ANDROID__ similar to 
  
    
      tensorflow/tensorflow/c/c_api.cc
    
    
         Line 2249
      in
      1737b80
    
    
    
    

        
          
           #ifdef __ANDROID__ 
        
    
  

 , since we don't include the required dependencies when building for Android (as per the BUILD file changes), which is probably a good thing since there doesn't seem to be a need for this in Android builds yet.
(So, these functions should fail if invoked in Android)
